text:
Zoe Swicord Kazan (born September 9, 1983) is an American actress, playwright, and screenwriter. She is known for her roles in "The Savages" (2007), "Revolutionary Road" (2008) and "It's Complicated" (2009).
In 2014, she appeared in the HBO miniseries "Olive Kitteridge", for which she received an Emmy nomination.
